column1: Now thats perspective. "Like a lot of her fellow Hawkeyes Ruline Steininger is really looking forward to the Iowa caucus
But theres at least one thing that sets her apart." "Ruline had the chance to meet Hillary when she came to hear her speak in Des Moines

She gave her a quick pep talkâ€”and told Hillary shes one of the most qualified candidates shes ever seen in her life." "Coming from Ruline thats really saying something." "If you live in Iowa dont miss your chance to be part of history
